= itemtype( arg1, ..., argN ) =

Checks if any of the supplied arguments matches an items in-game type

== Alias ==
type()

== Arguments ==

  * arg1...N = string(s) to match (in the clients language)

== Remarks ==
  * the item type value can be found on the debug info menu for that item

== Examples ==

`type( armor, weapon )`

`type( gem )`

`type( recipe )`
